description: completed copy, ff. 732. 387 x 240; 250 x 140 mm. 37 lin. 18th cen. On fol. 1a seals of ʻĀlamgīr (with date 1112 H.) and of Shāh Mīr al-Husaynī. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 549; S II, 604. Incip.: ... الحمد لله ... کتاب الطهارة وفىه سبعة ابواب الاول فى الوضوء
title: Fatāwá ʻĀlamgīrīyah
subject: Fatwas—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
